inclusion.criterion: Complete CV assessment including medical history, physical examination, blood pressure measurement and 12-lead electrocardiogram.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Dental examination with panoramic radiograph and selected periapical radiographs.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Brachial Artery Assessment with ultrasound images.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of localized or diffuse periodontal disease.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of non-endodontic lesion in Maxilla/ mandible.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, CVA, and PVD. However, they do not have any symptoms or signs that would make them ineligible for the trial.
